meta.content: Alex Palcuie Blog
Alex Palcuie, Romanian high-school student, geek, scout, loving computers, algorithms, the web, basketball, volunteering, rock music.

Ultima olimpiadă de informatică pentru mine. Ultima șansă de a arăta, ca elev, să arăt că știu algoritmică. Un concurs mai mult pentru orgoliul meu, deoarece deciziile privind facultatea le-am luat deja.
meta.name: description

meta.content: oni 2013, olimpiada, informatica, olimpiada nationala de informatica, timisoara
meta.name: keywords

meta.content: Ultima olimpiadă de informatică pentru mine. Ultima șansă de a arăta, ca elev, să arăt că știu algoritmică. Un concurs mai mult pentru orgoliul meu, deoarece deciziile privind facultatea le-am luat deja.

This weekend I did a little tour of the country. It started Friday, when I went to the Catalysts Coding Contest in Cluj, followed by the Amazon TechO(n) conference and Iași and finalized with the Romanian University Fair in Bucharest.
meta.name: description

meta.content: amazon techon, catalysts coding contest, riuf
meta.name: keywords

meta.content: This weekend I did a little tour of the country. It started Friday, when I went to the Catalysts Coding Contest in Cluj, followed by the Amazon TechO(n) conference and Iași and finalized with the Romanian University Fair in Bucharest.

Between 23-26 august I was at Fantanita Haiducului, near Sibiu at The Friendship Camp, an event organized by Leo District 124 Romania. It was a very fruitful meeting, where I had a lot of fun, met Leos from all over the country and participated at one of the best workshops in my life.
meta.name: description

meta.content: leo, friendship camp, romania
meta.name: keywords

meta.content: Between 23-26 august I was at Fantanita Haiducului, near Sibiu at The Friendship Camp, an event organized by Leo District 124 Romania. It was a very fruitful meeting, where I had a lot of fun, met Leos from all over the country and participated at one of the best workshops in my life.

InfoEducatie is a national contest high-school programming projects that is held every year in the Galaciuc camp, near Focsani. This year almost 150 students participated in the apps, web, robots, educational and multimedia sections.
meta.name: description

meta.content: infoeducatie, contest, 2012, computer science
meta.name: keywords

meta.content: InfoEducatie is a national contest high-school programming projects that is held every year in the Galaciuc camp, near Focsani. This year almost 150 students participated in the apps, web, robots, educational and multimedia sections.

After InfoEducatie, I arrived home for a night and then left directly to Calimanesti, which is about half an hour by car away from my town. I didn"t know a lot about the summer school where I was going, but for my surprise, I met a bunch of great people and it was a wonderful experience.
computer science, ip workshop, summer
meta.name: keywords

meta.content: After InfoEducatie, I arrived home for a night and then left directly to Calimanesti, which is about half an hour by car away from my town. I didn"t know a lot about the summer school where I was going, but for my surprise, I met a bunch of great people and it was a wonderful experience.

This week I am participating at the Millennium Youth Camp 2012 in Helsinki, a camp organised by the Millennium Technology Academy. We are 30 teenagers, from all over the world, spending one week in a remote hotel near Helsinki, visiting Finland, meeting with top engineers and Linus Torvalds.
millennium technology academy, finland
meta.name: keywords

meta.content: This week I am participating at the Millennium Youth Camp 2012 in Helsinki, a camp organised by the Millennium Technology Academy. We are 30 teenagers, from all over the world, spending one week in a remote hotel near Helsinki, visiting Finland, meeting with top engineers and Linus Torvalds.

The last 2 weekends were really awesome. First, I went to FII Competition, a contest organised by the student organisation from the Computer Science Iasi Faculty. Second, I went with my school in a study visit at the Adobe HQ in Bucharest.
meta.name: description

meta.content: fii competition, adobe, computer science
meta.name: keywords

meta.content: The last 2 weekends were really awesome. First, I went to FII Competition, a contest organised by the student organisation from the Computer Science Iasi Faculty. Second, I went with my school in a study visit at the Adobe HQ in Bucharest.

Last weekend I was in Bucharest for 2 hackdays: the first one was at UberVU, a social analytics company where they were developing an open-source Javascript framework, and the second one was at ROSEdu, an organisation in University Politehnica of Bucharest that helps students develop real-world coding skills.
meta.name: description

meta.content: hackathon, rosedu, ubervu
meta.name: keywords

meta.content: Last weekend I was in Bucharest for 2 hackdays: the first one was at UberVU, a social analytics company where they were developing an open-source Javascript framework, and the second one was at ROSEdu, an organisation in University Politehnica of Bucharest that helps students develop real-world coding skills.
Tomorrow I ll travel to Iasi to participate at the National Computer Science Olympiad, where I will compete with 400 of the best high-school coders in the country.
meta.name: description

meta.content: 2012, concurs, informatica, olimpiada, olimpiada nationala informatica
meta.name: keywords

meta.content: Tomorrow I ll travel to Iasi to participate at the National Computer Science Olympiad, where I will compete with 400 of the best high-school coders in the country.

Yesterday, I decided to flood GitHub with all my projects that were sitting in remote places on my computer. So, until now I have uploaded People Separator, 2 crawlers, 2 web projects, 5 Wordpress child themes, and a whole bunch of other things.
meta.name: description

meta.content: projects, hacks, open source, github
meta.name: keywords

meta.content: On the 11th of February, at -10 degrees Celsius, almost 80 people went out in the center of Ramnicu-Valcea, Romania, to demand the EU to reject the ratification of the Anti-Counterfeiting Trade Agreement, a global treaty which was signed in secrecy, that could allow corporations and governments to censor the internet.
meta.name: description

meta.content: acta, valcea, romania
meta.name: keywords

meta.content: DefCamp 2011, the first cyber-security conference in Romania, was held in Bran between 30 September - 2 October. Almost 70 hackers gathered to talk, share experience and have fun.
meta.name: description

meta.content: defcamp, 2011, bran, security, conference
meta.name: keywords

meta.content: GrepIT Botosani 2011, was the final contest of the summer, and took place between 28 August and 2 September. There were 2 categories: developers (split in apps and web) and media (split into stop motion and movies). It was the a funny experience, where I felt like the organizers were also contestants. It was also a lesson for me, on how to organize an event.
meta.name: description

meta.content: grepit, 2011, botosani, concurs
meta.name: keywords

meta.content: Dear Steve, This morning, when I woke up... I sensed it was something wrong. And as a matter of coincidence, when I went to school, I took my blue t-shirt with an iPod.
meta.name: description

meta.content: steve jobs
meta.name: keywords

meta.content: The National Romanian Scout Jamboree took place between 11 and 21 August, in Salistea, Sibiu. Altmost 1.300 scouts participated, and I was one of the lucky persons to spend 10 memorable days, with my patrol from our local center in Valcea.
meta.name: description

meta.content: scout, rojam, jamboree, 2011
meta.name: keywords

meta.content: InfoEducatie is a national IT contest, which takes place every year at Galaciuc, Vrancea. It is a place where high-school hackers gather, to present their projects to juries from different universities or companies (Google, Amazon)

meta.content: Sunt un fan al handbalului… cred ca merg la meciurile echipei Oltchim Râmnicu-Vâlcea de aproximativ 5 ani. ?i de asemenea, am facut ?i eu pu?in fotbal ?i baschet pâna acum. A?a ca voi vorbi despre evolu?ia echipei, cât timp Anja Andersen a fost antrenoare.
